## Installation

<Npm pkg="@sjsf/form @sjsf/skeleton-theme" />

:::note

This is Skeleton v3 based theme.

:::

### Install Skeleton

<LinkButton href="https://next.skeleton.dev/docs/get-started/installation/sveltekit" variant='minimal' target="_blank" icon="external" >
  SvelteKit - Skeleton
</LinkButton>

### Setup styles

There is two ways to setup styles:

1. Use tailwindcss config

```typescript
import { skeleton } from '@skeletonlabs/skeleton/plugin';
import * as themes from '@skeletonlabs/skeleton/themes';
import forms from '@tailwindcss/forms'
import { THEME_CONTENT } from '@sjsf/skeleton-theme/preset'

/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
export default {
  content: ['./src/**/*.{html,js,svelte,ts}', THEME_CONTENT],
  plugins: [
    forms,
    skeleton({
      themes: [/* themes.something */],
    })
  ],
}
```

2. Inject prepared styles (not recommended)

```typescript
// Inject them as you like
import daisyStyles from "@sjsf/skeleton-theme/styles.css?inline";
```

Bundled themes:

- `cerberus`
- `catppuccin`
- `pine`
- `rose`
